job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Title: Software Engineer</p><p>Location: Sunnyvale, California</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>Job Description: </p><p>As a Software Engineer in the Engineering Department, your primary responsibilities will include working side by side with R&amp;D and 3rd party vender on the development of new automated test equipment. You will be expected to demonstrated an excellent working knowledge of C/C# programming, developing application and automating tool per product required. You are a self-motivated professional who demonstrates the ability to quickly grasp new technologies, products and use cases.</p><p>Responsibilities will include:</p><ul><li>Participate in product functional, system architecture and design review.</li><li>Collaborate effectively with peers and venders to solve complex problems, deliver end-to-end quality in our product and customer experience.</li><li>Triage customer issues and find timely creative solution to customer problems.</li><li>Execute test cases, analyze and report test results to internal R&amp;D or venders.</li><li>Write API and feature documentation.</li></ul><p>Required qualifications:</p><ul><li>BS/MS in Computer Science or equivalent experience.</li><li>2+ year’ working experience on Windows/Linux SW development with strong debugging skills.</li><li>Have strong programming skills on C#, Java, Python, etc.</li><li>Knowledge of cloud-based services or imaging process will be preferred.</li><li>Strong collaboration and communication skills.</li><li>Strong initiative and ability to work independently.&nbsp;</li></ul>
